short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to provide page navigation and alteration accessibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decode is an accessibility tool in the form of a browser extension used on Google Chrome that, when active, alters the content on your site of choice to accommodate your specific accessibility needs.
